title: New housing increases Ig and AD

content.question: An increase in the purchases of newly constructed houses will result in which of the following?

choices.label: Aggregate demand will decrease as a result of a decrease in the price level.
Aggregate demand will increase as a result of an increase in investment spending.
Aggregate demand will increase as a result of an increase in exports.
Aggregate demand will not change, since consumer spending has not changed.
Aggregate demand will not change, since investment spending has not changed.

content.answer: Aggregate demand will increase as a result of an increase in investment spending.

skill.text: Skill 3.A: Determine the outcome of an economic situation using economic concepts, principles, or models.
